item.title: Sexism call for evidence launched at Imperial
item.author: Rebecca M Lane,
item.description: Let me start by introducing myself, I am Becky Lane and I am this year’s Deputy President (Welfare) and I have just finished my Physics degree at Imperial College. Although my experiences here as an undergraduate here at Imperial have generally been fine (aside from the OH-MY-GOD-EXAMS-ARE-SO-BAD) …

item.title: The problem with “Green Week”
item.author: Rebecca M Lane,
item.description: We are all guilty of not being as green as we could be. I know for one that I am guilty of chucking recyclables in my little desk bin at times when the journey to the recycling bin (just outside of my office) seems too far. Yet I just can’t help but feel that hosting a Green Week is not the way to …
